artiste: Various Artists, Alexander Calder, Marc Chagall, Maria Helena Vieira da Silva, Adolph Gottlieb, Wifredo Lam, Jacques Lipchitz, André Masson, Joan Miró, Robert Motherwell, Édouard Pignon, Fritz Wotruba
artisteBio: American, 1898–1976, French, born Belarus. 1887–1985, French, born Portugal. 1908–1992, American, 1903–1974, Cuban, 1902–1982, American, born Lithuania. 1891–1973, French, 1896–1987, Spanish, 1893–1983, American, 1915–1991, French, 1905–1993, Austrian, 1907–1975
title: Flight
medium: Portfolio of eleven lithographs and one screenprint
dimensions: composition (see child records): dimensions vary; sheet (orientation varies, each approx.): 25 1/2 × 19 3/4" (64.8 × 50.2 cm) or 19 3/4 × 25 1/2" (50.2 × 64.8 cm)
